testcase.system-out: Naukri input basic details with exp year and joining date Click intercepted, trying JS click Years of experience is updated in the dropdown successfully Avail to Join is updated Basic details saved successfully

testsuite.system-out: STEP 1: Initiating profile update module STEP 2: Clicking on the menu (three dots) STEP 3: Checking and hiding chat window if present ✔ No chat window found to hide STEP 4: Clicking on 'View & Update Profile' STEP 5: Waiting for any loading overlays to disappear ✔ Loader disappeared, proceeding STEP 6: Scrolling to the 'Delete Resume' icon ✔ Scrolled to the element successfully STEP 7: Clicking the 'Delete Resume' icon STEP 8: Clicking the confirmation 'Delete' button on popup ✔ Resume successfully deleted STEP 9: Clicking 'Upload Resume' button STEP 10: Uploading new resume ✔ Resume uploaded successfully Resume Headline module is initiated Resume headline module is validated successfully Skills module is initiated Skills module is validated successfully Naukri basic details module is initiated Click intercepted, trying JS click Name field is cleared Entered invalid data in the name field Click intercepted, trying JS click Basic details module is validated with invalid data Naukri input field module is initiated with valid data Click intercepted, trying JS click Entered valid data in the name field Basic details module is validated with valid data Naukri input basic details with exp year and joining date Click intercepted, trying JS click Years of experience is updated in the dropdown successfully Avail to Join is updated Basic details saved successfully
